translations: 抛物线的；比喻的；寓言的

phrs.translation: 抛物线；抛物曲线；抛物线型曲线
抛物柱面镜；抛物面反射镜

sentences.sentence: Gaudi pioneered the parabolic arch, with its perfect distribution of load.
sentences.translation: 高迪首创了抛物线拱，其载荷分布完美。

sentences.sentence: The Lockheed design USES an inverted parabolic shape over a V-shaped engine array.
sentences.translation: 洛克希德采用了一种在V型引擎阵列上安置倒抛物线状尾翼的设计。

sentences.sentence: This will be done on a parabolic aircraft flight hopefully before the end of the year.
sentences.translation: 测试是在一个抛物线飞行的航空器上，希望年底前能完成。
